Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings

Items.Title: Oversight - NYC’s Cooling Towers
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to documentation, submission and public availability of cooling tower inspections and certifications
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Documentation and submission of cooling tower inspections and certifications.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to holding information sessions and posting information online to provide guidance to building owners regarding maintenance and inspections of cooling towers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Holding information sessions and posting information online to provide guidance to building owners regarding maintenance and inspections of cooling towers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting the results of cooling tower inspections and to repeal certain provisions of Local Law 77 for the year 2015, relating to cooling towers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting the results of cooling tower inspections and to repeal certain provisions of Local Law 77 for the year 2015, relating to cooling towers.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring an assessment of potential determinants of Legionnaires’ disease in the city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Assessment of potential determinants of Legionnaires’ disease in the city.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Cornegy, Grodenchik, Cabrera, Perkins, Rosenthal, Gjonaj and Chin
